alert.note: Alert for Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains; Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued October 25 at 11:47AM MDT until October 26 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations between 3 and 7 inches. * WHERE...Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains and Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult and tire chains may be required for some vehicles. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Those in the backcountry should ensure they are prepared for dangerous conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commutes, especially today. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A break in the snow is expected later this afternoon, but another wave of snow overspreads the area tonight and through the day on Thursday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains; Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass
